cause.description:
This is a nation wide crisis. The objective is to give awareness to all those who steal the marshmallows and let them know we're watching you and support those who pour a bowl of marshmallowless cereal. We feel for you.
1. Stop
2. The
3. Thievery
cause.mission: To stop people from eating all the marshmallows out of the Lucky Charms box and leaving the rest.
cause.name: Save Luck's Charms
